content:
Intern at CCVL (Summer'24) Internship with CCVL Group I’m thrilled to announce that I’ll be interning with the CCVL (Computational Cognition, Vision, and Learning) research group at Johns Hopkins University this summer under the guidance of Feng and Jieru. I’m grateful for this exciting opportunity.
[2023-12-19] One paper on document image enhancement is accepted by AAAI !! DocNLC: A Document Image Enhancement Framework with Normalized and Latent Contrastive Representation for Multiple Degradations Ruilu Wang, Yang Xue*, Lianwen Jin
In Proceedings of the AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence, Vancouver, 2024
pdf link : (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1F2K9PFLcK77QWtOweXbkV5SQKwxwUTV2/view?usp=sharing)
title: News
